channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Bob Marley & The Wailers

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Lively Up Yourself - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy
Lively Up Yourself - Bob Marley
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or a back beat strum
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Exodus - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use.
As performed by Bob Marley & the Wailers Source video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ImQewFMzIzI
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Redemption Song
item.description:
IMPORTANT! The tabs at 00:06 are wrong. The numer 7 in the top string should be a 5. Sorry for the mistake!
-
Hey! Check my awesome stuff for merch at https://www.redbubble.com/people/Ukeledu/shop
-
¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Verse / Verso: D xU UDU Chorus / Estribillo: D DU UDU D DUD DU After 2º Chorus / Después del 2º Estribillo: D xU UDU DU DUD Last Riff / Último Riff: D xU DUD D DU x DUDUDUDUDUDUD
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.
